Class ReportsController

java.lang.Object
ted.wguc195.controllers.BaseController
ted.wguc195.controllers.ReportsController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReportsContactController, ReportsMonthController, ReportsTypeController, ReportsUserController
public class ReportsController extends BaseController
The controller that handles the Reports view.
